https://tmrev.io/movie/408367-Abierto 24 horas 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null A taxi driver, who becomes the anonymous confidant of his passengers, witnesses the various stories they tell him. A famous actress, a child rescued from the underworld witness to the murder of her parents, and a woman victim of domestic violence are the characters that lead us to reflect on some of the realities that we live in our society. Abierto 24 horas
